bibl.title: Ploia thalassia on the Nile.
bibl.note: On the organization of the river transport of state goods in Ptolemaic Egypt, and the corn supplies due to the crews of seagoing ships.

bibl.title: Études dédiées à la mémoire d'André M. Andréadès

bibl.seg: Rostovtzeff Michael I., Ploia thalassia on the Nile.
Études dédiées à la mémoire d'André M. Andréadès (Athènes, 1940) pp. 367-376.
On the organization of the river transport of state goods in Ptolemaic Egypt, and the corn supplies due to the crews of seagoing ships.
